text: Yithi (Muhammad): “Mna andinamandla akuzinceda nakuzonzakalisa ngaphandle koko uAllâh Akuvumeleyo. Ukuba bendinalo ulwazi lokungabonwayo, ngesele ndaziqokelelela imfumba yobutyebi kwaye bekungayi kubakho bubi bunokundihlela. Mna, kuphela ndinguMlumkisi nomzisi weendaba ezilungileyo kubantu abakholwayo.”
